channel.title: Lagging on server
channel.description: I followed this guide ([url=http://www.sythe.org/showthread.php?t=393406]http://www.sythe.org/showthread.php?t=393406[/url]) step by step to get a server up and running and I used Allstarscape as the base. I could log on to the server just fine but it was very laggish. I also didn't like the base so I deleted Allstar and downloaded OldkoScape instead. I compiled it and ran the server, but when I tried to log on to the server it said "Error Connecting to Server". I know I have the portforwarding and no-ip DUC stuff right because it worked last night with allstar scape. Anyone know whats wrong?

item.title: Lagging on server
item.dc:creator: @smellz smellz
item.description:
@smellz wrote:

what do i set it to?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 05, 2008, 11:56:27 am[/size][hr]I have no clue what i did but i jsut got it to work. Only problem is that when i log on it is VERY LAGGISH and I loose connection often…anyone know how to fix it? (im using oldkoscape

I know I have the portforwarding and no-ip DUC stuff right because it worked last night with allstar scape. Anyone know whats wrong?
